about_the_game:
In this concept demo you'll meet Bob, an oddball fellow who also likes to forget one or two important details. He can certainly provide you with something to be done. You'll learn the ability "streak" (short-range teleportation) and even a boss fight awaits you.

"MOKI - The Escape - Concept Demo" offers a glimpse of a challenging 2.5D jump & run platformer with lovable characters and an emotional story.

A concept demo is a playable preview version of the game to get an insight into its foundations. This means the basic game mechanics are playable, but with limited content and graphic fidelity. The main game will have a much higher quality in all aspects (graphics, content, animations, etc).
detailed_description:
In this concept demo you'll meet Bob, an oddball fellow who also likes to forget one or two important details. He can certainly provide you with something to be done. You'll learn the ability "streak" (short-range teleportation) and even a boss fight awaits you.

"MOKI - The Escape - Concept Demo" offers a glimpse of a challenging 2.5D jump & run platformer with lovable characters and an emotional story.

A concept demo is a playable preview version of the game to get an insight into its foundations. This means the basic game mechanics are playable, but with limited content and graphic fidelity. The main game will have a much higher quality in all aspects (graphics, content, animations, etc).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB (1 gig)

short_description: "MOKI - The Escape - Concept Demo" offers a glimpse into a challenging 2.5D platform game with lovable characters and an emotional story.
supported_languages: English, German, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Spanish - Spain
